特記事項:
この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。

本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This course will be conducted face -to-face with the possibility of some classes being held on demand should the situation require.

This course will be conducted through a series of short lectures and seminars. Students will be expected to participate actively in discussions, deliver presentations and submit written assignments. There will be a strong emphasis on pair and group work throughout the course.

(Information for students permitted to take classes online)
Classes will be broadcast through a combination of PowerPoint presentations with audio and data recorded from face-to-face-classes. Materials
will be shared through Google Classroom.
